reviewText:
This DVD is excellent. Short sessions dealing with the issues of life. From knowing are identify in Christ to getting
free from sexual sin.
Too short. I wish he would delve deeper into the subject. Still good but wanted more indepth insight.

We used this in our prayer meeting. For those who had joined the prayer team and were not that far on their Christian journey it was very good. The session on forgiveness has been very meaningful to a few people. God is amazing he will and can use these truths to set people free.

This product was not what I expected.  I thought it went with the book but it doesn't.  That being said...it was a wonderful surprise.  I thoroughly enjoyed the series of sermons and would highly recommend this product
This series is good but it wasn't quite what I was looking for. I was looking for something for young men and it doesn't quite fit what we were trying to get across.
you can't go wrong with Neil Anderson's teachings, what a humble gracious man who just shoots from the hip with out killing you.  Your only responsibility is to be honest when you see your self.

An incredibly powerful tool!  Here's an instrument God will use powerfully.  With convincing ease, Neil Anderson presents the biblical basis for winning over Satan and finding freedom in Christ.  Both the life-changing message and Neil's personal compassion grip the heart.  Now anyone can access the Steps to Freedom in Christ with the best-selling author himself leading the way.  Five stars!
Chuck Mylander
Director, Evangelical Friends Mission
